locations.name: Central Park
locations.description: Iconic urban park in the heart of Manhattan, offering a variety of fitness activities and beautiful scenery.

locations.name: Santa Monica Beach
locations.address: Santa Monica Beach, Santa Monica, CA 90401
locations.description: Scenic beachfront location for outdoor workouts, including beach volleyball, cycling, and jogging.

locations.name: Venice Beach
locations.description: Home to the famous Muscle Beach Gym, known for bodybuilding and strength training.

locations.name: Boulder, Colorado
locations.description: A fitness-oriented city with access to hiking, biking, and a strong outdoor culture in the Rocky Mountains.

locations.name: Lakefront Trail
locations.description: 18-mile trail along Lake Michigan, perfect for running, cycling, and walking with scenic city views.

locations.name: Runyon Canyon Park
locations.address: Runyon Canyon Park, Los Angeles, CA 90046
locations.description: A popular spot for hiking and trail running with excellent views of Los Angeles and the Hollywood Sign.

locations.name: Golden Gate Park
locations.address: Golden Gate Park, San Francisco, CA 94122
locations.description: Urban park providing opportunities for jogging, rollerblading, and practicing yoga amidst nature.

locations.name: Red Rock Canyon
locations.address: Red Rock Canyon, Las Vegas, NV 89161
locations.description: A stunning desert location with hiking, rock climbing, and trail running opportunities.

locations.name: Mount Hood
locations.description: Ideal for hiking, skiing, snowboarding, and various outdoor activities in the Pacific Northwest.

locations.name: Great Smoky Mountains National Park
locations.address: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Gatlinburg, TN 37738
locations.description: The most visited national park in the U.S., offering a wide range of hiking trails and natural beauty.
